title: The new Samsung microSD took just a month to get a 30% price drop
description: Looking to expand your external storage? The Samsung PRO Ultimate 512GB microSD is already down to $44.99.

title: Fairphone 4 gets Android 13, could extend support up to Android 15
description: All users should have the update in the coming weeks.

title: The new Echo Show devices start from $40 as prices plunge to record lows
description: Whichever Echo Show display you have your eye on, there's never been a better time to buy.

title: The OnePlus Open and OPPO Find N3 are confirmed to be the same phone
description: The foldable will have a 37% smaller hinge compared to the Find N3.

title: Garmin Vivoactive 5 review: Should you buy it?
description: The latest updates to the Vivoactive line were well worth the wait.

title: Pixel 8 Pro unboxed on video: This phone might not attract fingerprints
description: Now all we need is a full video review ahead of Wednesday's launch event.

title: Chromebook Plus: Huge and exciting changes with a boring name
description: At face value, Chromebook Plus sounds like a juiced-up Chromebook, but this new classification system is way more than that.

title: TikTok is testing an ad-free monthly subscription plan
description: For $4.99 per month in the testing phase, users will be able to enjoy an ad-free TikTok experience.

title: BMW’s in-car wireless charging will break your new iPhone 15
description: Got an iPhone 15 series handset and a BMW? Maybe steer clear of the car's wireless charger for now.

title: We asked, you told us: You overwhelmingly still have hope for Wear OS
description: You haven't given up on Wear OS just yet. Far from it, in fact.

title: Samsung confirms launch on the same day as Pixel 8, likely for the Galaxy S23 FE
description: Samsung India has teased the launch of a new phone for October 4, and this is likely to be for the Galaxy S23 FE.

title: Leaked promo video shows how easy it is to switch to Pixel 8
description: Google wants consumers to know that transferring to the Pixel 8 series is a mostly pain-free experience.

title: Galaxy S24 Plus renders leak: iPhone-style flat edges, but what else?
description: It looks like Samsung is taking the same approach to edges as the base Galaxy S24.

title: The Pixel 8 launches later this week, but we’ve already got an unboxing clip
description: The unboxing clip confirms a 6.2-inch screen, 128GB of base storage, and box contents (obviously).

title: Here’s how to enable XMP
description: Enabling XMP unlocks the full potential of your computer’s RAM.
